entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
